    "number": 190810,
    "data": "1,2,3,5,7,8,11,14,15,17,20,23,29,31,32,35,41,44,47,50,59,63,65,68,71,83,86,89,92,95,101,104,119,122,127,131,137,140,143,149,167,173,176,179,185,188,191,194,203,209,212,239,245,248,255,257,263,266,275,281",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 2x+1 and 3x-1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A190803."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A190810/b190810.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 2; i = 1; j = 3; k = -1; f = 1; g = 9 ;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]  (* A190810 *)",
        "b = (a - 1)/2; c = (a + 1)/3; r = Range[1, 900];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A190855 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A190856 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a190810 n = a190810_list !! (n-1)",
        "a190810_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (2*m+1) $ insert (3*m-1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011",
        "(PARI) is(n)=if(n<7, n!=4, (n%3==1 && is(n\\3)) || (n%2 && is(n\\2))) \\\\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 14 2016"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A190803, A190855, A190856."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 20 2011",
    "ext": [
        "a(55)=255 inserted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
